product_name: Patagonia Cross Back Tank Top - Women's
long_description: Cultivate a mindful attitude in the breathable comfort of the Patagonia Cross Back tank top. Its designed for yoga and features a built-in shelf bra for light support. Organic cotton offers breathable comfort and easy care, and a touch of spandex provides light stretch. The Patagonia Cross Back tank top offers a slim fit.
short_description: Cultivate a mindful attitude in the breathable comfort of the Patagonia Cross Back tank top. Its designed for yoga and features a built-in shelf bra for light support.
